triggers.name: Lack of free memory on server {HOST.NAME}

items.name: Memory Percent Committed Bytes In Use

discovery_rules.name: Disk Performance Discovery
discovery_rules.key: zabbix_wmi[-a, discover_n_multiple, -qf, "Name,AvgDiskReadQueueLength,AvgDiskWriteQueueLength,DiskReadBytesPersec,DiskReadsPersec,DiskWriteBytesPersec,DiskWritesPersec,FreeMegabytes,PercentFreeSpace,PercentDiskTime,PercentIdleTime", -f, "NOT Name LIKE '_Total' AND NOT Name LIKE 'HarddiskVo%'", -c, Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfDisk_LogicalDisk, -atype, userpass, -user, {$WMIC_USER}, -pass, {$WMIC_PASSWORD}, -dom, {$WMIC_DOMAIN}, -t, {HOST.CONN}, -zhost, {HOST.NAME}]

trigger_prototypes.name: Free disk space is less than 10% on volume {#WMI.NAME}

discovery_rules.name: Network Adapters Discovery
discovery_rules.key: zabbix_wmi[-a, discover_n_multiple, -qf, "Name,BytesRecievedPersec,BytesSentPersec,BytesTotalPersec", -f, "NOT Name LIKE 'isatap%' AND NOT Name LIKE 'Teredo%' AND NOT Name LIKE '%ISATAP%'", -c, Win32_PerfFormattedData_Tcpip_NetworkInterface, -atype, userpass, -user, {$WMIC_USER}, -pass, {$WMIC_PASSWORD}, -dom, {$WMIC_DOMAIN}, -t, {HOST.CONN}, -zhost, {HOST.NAME}]

trigger_prototypes.expression: {Template WMI OS Windows:Started[{#WMI.NAME}].last()}<>1 and {Template WMI OS Windows:StartMode[{#WMI.NAME}].str(Auto)}=1
trigger_prototypes.name: Service {#WMI.NAME} ({#WMI.NAME}) is not started
